extension.description:
Watch free live TV channels from Czech Republic and Slovakia. Supports EPG (Electronic Program Guide) and integration with PVR IPTV Simple Client.
VERSION FOR KODI 20 NEXUS
Supported channels: - CT (Ceska televize): CT1, CT2, CT24, CT Sport, CT:D/art + CATCHUP (7 days) - STVR (Slovak TV): Jednotka, Dvojka, Trojka, :24, Sport + CATCHUP (~1200 programs) - Prima: Prima, Cool, Max, Krimi, Love, Zoom, Star, Show, CNN Prima News + CATCHUP (7 days) - JOJ: JOJ, Plus, WAU, Family, Cinema, 24 - Nova: Nova Cinema (live only, no catchup - requires DRM) - TA3, Ocko, and more...
Features: - Live TV streaming - EPG support (7 days) - Catch-up for CT, Prima and STVR - STVR catchup: ~1200 own productions (auto-downloaded index) - PVR IPTV Simple Client integration
